resources.string: Welcome, this is an example application that shows how to use eznfc library for Android.
This is an example tag write activity, tap an NFC tag and it will write the default message
This is an example beam activity, tap your phone with another one and it will send the default message
This is an example NFC foreground dispatcher, it is used to read an NFC tag or a beam. Try it to read the contents.
This phone does not support NFC
NFC is disabled, turn it on and try again
